Package vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.storagelayer

Interface StorageLayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
HashMapStorageLayer
public interface StorageLayer
Interface representing the storage layer of the decentralized access policy framework. The storage layer is realized using a multi-value distributed hash table. The StorageElements in that DHT are identified using StorageElementIdentifier instances.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default @NotNull PersonalQueueIterator getPersonalQueueUser​(@NotNull PublicEntityIdentifier publicEntityIdentifier)
    Method to iterate over the personal queue of the user associated with the provided PublicEntityIdentifier.

    Method to add a new StorageElement to the storage layer.

    Method to receive the StorageElements, published using the given StorageElementIdentifier, as a set.
    default <T extends StorageElement>
    java.util.Set<T>    		 retrieve​(@NotNull StorageElementIdentifier identifier, @NotNull java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
    Cf. retrieve(StorageElementIdentifier) method, with the only exception that this method already filters the StorageElements based on the given Class parameter.

    • retrieve

      java.util.Set<StorageElement> retrieve​(@NotNull @NotNull StorageElementIdentifier identifier) throws java.io.IOException
      Method to receive the StorageElements, published using the given StorageElementIdentifier, as a set.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier.
      Returns:
      The StorageElements.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the StorageLayer could not be consulted, due to an IO-related problem.

      Cf. retrieve(StorageElementIdentifier) method, with the only exception that this method already filters the StorageElements based on the given Class parameter.
      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      clazz - The class of the subtype of the StorageElement class for which results should be returned.
